column2: and we're promptly sat outside. Took a few minutes for the waiter to showed up
column3: but it was sort of busy so we weren't too concerned. When he came over
column6: and when we told him we hadn't been there before he just said okay and walked off. If this guy would've put in ANY effort
column7: he could've pushed our tab up another 30-40 bucks. Any way
column8: this apparently is a hip place to get lunch
column9: so bad service was to be expected.
